linkedinPosts.text: 𝗜 𝗮𝗺 𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝘀𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗜 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗳𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗺𝘆 𝗔𝗜 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗮𝘁 Kafein Technology Solutions. During this journey, I had the opportunity to work with modern technologies, improve my technical skills, and contribute to enterprise-scale projects.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 🚀 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝗹𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗠𝗖𝗣 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝗿 - 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗹𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗼𝗺𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆 & 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲! Slack MCP Server powered by GPT-4.1-nano, FastMCP 2.8.0, Tavily & Claude Desktop.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: I am happy to share that I have completed my Bachelor's degree in Mechatronics Engineering at Bahçeşehir Üniversitesi! During these intense 4 years, I spent my first 1.5 years working as a student assistant, and the last 2 years doing internships in R&D and IT fields.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: I'm excited to share that I've earned a new certification: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Course – Hugging Face!
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: I'm excited to share that I've started working as a full-time AI Engineer Intern at Kafein Technology Solutions
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 🎓 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁 – 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗯𝗼𝘅: 𝗔𝗜-𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗼𝗺𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 & 𝗖𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺. An autonomous plant cultivation system that integrates IoT sensing, edge AI, computer vision, and GPT-driven decision intelligence.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: I'm happy to share that I've been accepted into the AI Bootcamp organized by Kairu. It's a great opportunity to improve my skills in AI engineering. Thanks to the Kairu team for this opportunity!
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 🚦Real-Time Traffic Management with Computer Vision 🕶️ An innovative project that turns ordinary CCTV cameras into powerful traffic analysis tools! Integrated Supervision Polygon Tool with CCTV footage, used OpenCV for image processing.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰 𝗠𝗼𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗖𝗖𝗧𝗩 𝗔𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘀𝗶𝘀 🚗📊 I am excited to share my latest project, which aims to detect traffic violations and contribute to smart city solutions!
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 🚀 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗲-𝗧𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗬𝗢𝗟𝗢𝘃𝟭𝟮𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗙𝗶𝗿𝗲 & 𝗦𝗺𝗼𝗸𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻! Fire and smoke detection is a critical application of computer vision. Enhanced detection accuracy and high-performance real-time analysis.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: I am happy to share that I have earned a new certification: AI Agents Fundamentals - Hugging Face!
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil

linkedinPosts.text: 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗟-𝗧𝗜𝗠𝗘 𝗧𝗛𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗧 𝗗𝗘𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 - This fully local AI-powered threat detection agent, developed with Ultralytics YOLOv11n and DeepSeek AI 1.5B, identifies firearms in real time from CCTV footage.
linkedinPosts.author: Baha Kizil
